name: Just Normal Game
description:
Before playing this game it would be good if you would watch this video because I took that idea and made it to the actual game. 

Video link:

The game is quite short only three levels. The first is just an open map basically and the last two have some challenges. 

W, A, S, D - moving

Space - Jumping

ESC - Pause menu (Options)

Thanks :)

If you like my work you can support me here: ko-fi.com/tarnepgames
